Rosmontis:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
Rosmontis:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

Rosmontis:StrikeRos.NAME: 打击
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 她的兄弟手握重剑
挥锤大地

Rosmontis:DefendRos.NAME: 防御
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 剑盾立体防御

Rosmontis:Skill3.NAME: 如你所愿
Rosmontis:Skill3.DESCRIPTION: 全力以赴。所有攻击牌费用*2，视为打出3次。每次打出有20%的概率眩晕目标。失去3点敏捷。
Rosmontis:Skill3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有。全力以赴。所有攻击牌费用*2，视为打出3次。每次打出有20%的概率眩晕目标。失去3点敏捷。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 这片大地仍垂怜你

Rosmontis:Memory.NAME: 回忆
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

Rosmontis:ConcentrateRos.NAME: 集中
Rosmontis:ConcentrateRos.DESCRIPTION: 随机消耗一张牌，获得3点临时生命。
Rosmontis:ConcentrateRos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗一张牌，获得5点临时生命。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

Rosmontis:FlyRos.NAME: 飞行
Rosmontis:FlyRos.DESCRIPTION: 消耗。获得1回合无实体。获得2敏捷。
Rosmontis:FlyRos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得1回合无实体。获得2敏捷。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.

Rosmontis:HeavyAttackRos.NAME: 重击
Rosmontis:HeavyAttackRos.DESCRIPTION: 造成 *2 次 !D! 单体伤害和 *3 点全体伤害。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

Rosmontis:PsyStorm.NAME: 念力风暴
Rosmontis:PsyStorm.DESCRIPTION: 消耗。对全体敌人造成2-4-8-16-32...点伤害。
Rosmontis:PsyStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗，保留。对全体敌人造成2-4-8-16-32...点伤害。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.
